factions.name: Aliens
factions.description: Gain victory points without breaking bases.

factions.name: Dinosaurs
factions.description: High-powered minions break bases quickly.

factions.name: Ninjas
factions.description: Destroy minions and sneak onto bases at the last second.

factions.name: Pirates
factions.description: Move around from base to base and destroy weak minions.

factions.name: Robots
factions.description: Play lots of weak minions at once.

factions.name: Tricksters
factions.description: Force other players to discard and make bases undesirable to play on.

factions.name: Wizards
factions.description: Draw quickly, and play several cards per turn.

factions.name: Zombies
factions.description: Play minions from the discard pile.

factions.name: Bear Cavalry
factions.description: Move other players' minions.

factions.name: Ghosts
factions.description: Benefit from discarding and having 2 or fewer cards in their hand.

factions.name: Killer Plants
factions.description: Search your deck for weak minions, play extra minions, and setup multi-turn abilities.

factions.name: Steampunks
factions.description: Powerful base actions that can be played from the discard pile.

factions.name: Elder Things
factions.description: Give Madness to other players, and strong minions that are difficult to play.

factions.name: Innsmouth
factions.description: Lots of power 2 minions that work together well.

factions.name: Minions of Cthulhu
factions.description: Play lots of actions, slow the game down, and gain Madness.

factions.name: Miskatonic University
factions.description: Gain, use, and lose Madness to accomplish a little of everything.

factions.name: Cyborg Apes
factions.description: Play actions on minions to power them up.

factions.name: Shapeshifters
factions.description: Copy other players' power and abilities.

factions.name: Super Spies
factions.description: Force other players to discard and play special abilities while bases are scoring.

factions.name: Time Travelers
factions.description: Replay actions and minions.

factions.name: Giant Ants
factions.description: Play and move +1 power counters on your minions.

factions.name: Mad Scientists
factions.description: Play and manipulate +1 power counters on your minions.

factions.name: Vampires
factions.description: Destroy minions to gain power.

factions.name: Werewolves
factions.description: Gain power on your turn and destroy minions.

factions.name: Geeks
factions.description: Interrupt other players' turns and disrupt their plans.

factions.name: Fairies
factions.description: Play extra cards and manipulate actions played on minions.

factions.name: Kitty Cats
factions.description: Take control of other player's minions and destroy them.

factions.name: Mythic Horses
factions.description: Benefit from having lots of minions together.

factions.name: Princesses
factions.description: A few strong minions.
